entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Blowing snow overnight. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 34 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Sunny. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 34 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Blowing snow early in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the evening. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 48 in the evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023
